props.bordered: Applies a **2px** by default and **1.5px** border around the badge when using the **dot** property.
props.content: Text content to show in the badge.
props.dot: Reduce the size of the badge and hide its contents.
props.floating: Move the badge further away from the slotted content. Equivalent to an 8px offset.
props.inline: Display as an inline block instead of absolute position. **location**, **floating**, and **offset** will have no effect.
props.label: The **aria-label** used for the badge.
props.max: Sets the maximum number allowed when using the **content** prop with a `number` like value. If the content number exceeds the maximum value, a `+` suffix is added.
props.offsetX: Offset the badge on the x-axis.
props.offsetY: Offset the badge on the y-axis.

slots.badge: The slot used for the badge's content.
